alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gallatin County through 930 PM MDT... At 900 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Bozeman, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Gallatin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains
